rooms.description: Large entrance hall featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light and a Scandinavian aesthetic. Vastu compliant with east facing openings.
Spacious living room with high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows along the south wall to maximize natural light. Incorporates Scandinavian minimalist design.
Dining area integrated within the living space with an open-plan layout and subtle Vastu alignments to ensure positive energy flow.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen with functional cabinetry, ample storage, and floor-to-ceiling windows along the east fa√ßade for optimal morning light. Vastu guidelines are followed for positioning.
Comfortable servants quarters with private bathroom and basic amenities, placed discreetly near the rear of the ground floor to maintain privacy.
Master bedroom featuring a walk-in closet, en-suite bathroom with floor-to-ceiling windows facing north for calmness and light. Vastu compliant design ensures positive energy.
Guest bedroom with sufficient space, integrated storage, and a window layout that adheres to Vastu principles for balanced light and air circulation.
Cozy study/office area with ample natural light via floor-to-ceiling windows on the south side. Designed following Scandinavian minimalism and Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned to face north as per Vastu guidelines for welcoming positive energy.
Service entrance with easy access to the garden and outdoor area.
Garage entry integrated into the design, placed following Vastu principles for utility spaces.
Floor-to-ceiling window overlooking the garden area to ensure maximum natural light and scenic views.

rooms.description: Alternate master bedroom on the upper level offering enhanced privacy and a panoramic view of the garden. Floor-to-ceiling windows face east for morning light.
Additional guest bedroom with ample space and well-placed windows ensuring adherence to Vastu principles.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window openings on the upper level for natural light and a Scandinavian feel.
Balcony door providing access to a small private outdoor area overlooking the garden.
